get.summary: Get the payment information based on the proxy information provided.

404.description: Unable to find the payment account proxy.

get.summary: Get pricing for card/bank proxy and payment amount

parameters.name: proxy
parameters.description: Proxy which will be used for processing the payment

parameters.name: paymentAmount
parameters.description: Payment amount to determine the pricing

200.description: Pricing response for proxy and payment amount provided.

404.description: Unable to find the pricing response for the provided proxy.

totalEntries.description: Total batch items in the batch

status.description:
Below are the expected output values:
1) File Uploaded: Batch file is uploaded and pending file processing
2) Pending: Payment is not processed yet
3) Validation in Progress: Batch validation is in progress
4) On Hold - Potential Duplicate: Batch is on hold awaiting manual activation
5) Ready for Payment Processing: Batch duplicate validation is completed and now it is ready for Payment processing
6) On Hold Approved
7) Payment Processing in Progress: Batch payment processing in progress
8) Completed: Batch payment processing completed
9) Cancelled: Batch payment is cancelled
10) BatchPay Not Allowed: Error in processing - Merchant status doesn't allow to process batch payment
11) Merchant Not Found: Error in file/batch processing merchant code in file not found in database
12) Technical Error: Any technical error like batch entry has been added twice

merchantUniqueBatchId.description: Unique batch id provided by the merchant.

customerReference.description: Reference of the Customer who paid the payment

paymentAmount.description: Total payment amount including the fees

entryStatus.description:
Below are the expected output values:
 1) BatchPay Entry Pending : This Entry is waiting to be processed.
 2) BatchPay Entry Processed : Payment for this Entry has been successfully processed.
 3) Customer not found : This Customer is not found in system. Create the Customer using POST - /v2/customers API.
 4) Duplicate entry : There is a duplicate entry in the batch. Remove duplicate entry.
 5) Multiple customers found : The System has detected that there is Multiple Customers that have the same Reference setup. Check Customers and update reference.
 6) Customer status is not open : Corresponding customer for batchpay entry is not in open state. Update Customer Status to Open.
 7) Payment end date has expired : Payment End Date for BatchPay Entry has expired. Update Date to a future date.
 8) Payment option is not BatchPay : Customer's Payment Option needs to be BatchPay in order to be processed. Update Customer Payment Option to BatchPay.
 9) Customer status does not allow payment processing : Customer Status is invalid. Customer Status must be Open to process payments. Check Status of Customer.
10) Invalid payment amount : Payment amount is not valid. Check amount and resubmit.
11) Error during payment processing : There was an error while processing payment. Please contact Zenith Payments.
12) Technical Error : This Entry has encountered an unhandled error. Please contact Zenith Payments.
13) Cancelled : Batch is cancelled.
14) DuplicatePaymentUniqueId : Duplicate payment unique id.

paymentStatus.description:
Below are the expected output values:
 1) Pending : This Payment is waiting be to processed.
 2) Error : This Payment has encountered an Error.
 3) Submitted : This Payment was successfully submitted.
 4) Successful : This Payment was successful.
 5) Successful (Recalled) : This Payment was Recalled. The System has detected that this Entry potentially has been submitted in another Batch. 
 6) Successful (Refunded) : This Payment was Refunded.
 7) Successful (Refunded) (Recalled) - This Payment was Refunded and Recalled
 8) Failed : This Payment has Failed.
 9) Cancelled : This Payment was Cancelled.
10) Suppressed : This Payment was Suppressed.
11) InProgress : This Payment is being processed.

failureCode.description: return failure code if a payment is failed. Please refer: http://tinyurl.com/y6lkmpsv for more details. (Conditional)

failureReason.description: return failure reason if a payment is failed. (Conditional)

processorReference.description: Processor reference for the payment done

paymentReference.description: Unique Payment Reference for the payment done.

baseAmount.description: Base amount of the payment is done

processedAmount.description: Total payment amount including the fees

paymentMethod.description: Method was used to process the transaction. ie: Bank Account, Credit Card, etc

processingDate.description: Processing Date for the payment. Date Format: yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ, TimeZone: AEST

settlementDate.description: Settlement Date for the payment. This is a calculated date and may change until the payment been settled. Date Format: yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ, TimeZone: AEST

isPaymentRetryScheduled.description: Return TRUE if it is a retry payment pending. Based on Program/Merchant settings, a failed payment will be retried.

retryScheduledOn.description: Retry payment scheduled date. Date Format: yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ, TimeZone: AEST (Conditional)

recalledOn.description: Recalled date. Date Format: yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ, TimeZone: AEST (Conditional)

refundedOn.description: Refunded date. Date Format: yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ, TimeZone: AEST (Conditional)

merchantUniquePaymentId.description: Unique payment id provided by the merchant. (Conditional)

BatchPaymentRequest.description:
Container for batch payment entries
Root element containing a collection of BatchPaymentEntry

merchantUniqueBatchId.description: Unique batch id provided by the merchant.

BatchPaymentDataRecord.description:
Represent one batch payment entry sent from the client
Format can either be in the form of Json or XML

customerReference.description: customer reference in individual payment batch entry

paymentAmount.description: Payment amount in individual payment batch entry

merchantUniquePaymentId.description: Unique payment id provided by the merchant. Can be used when Proxy payment is performed. (Optional)

paymentAccountProxy.description: Pass an alternative Proxy if required (Optional). If no Proxy is passed, the nominated card / bank account is used.

BatchPaymentResponse.description: Batch Payment Response for call to Uploading

merchantUniqueBatchId.description: Unique batch id provided by the merchant.

ModelState.description: Encapsulates the state of model binding to a property of an action-method argument, or to the argument itself.

value.description: Gets a {System.Web.Http.ValueProviders.ValueProviderResult} object that encapsulates the value that was being bound during model binding.

errors.description: Gets a {System.Web.Http.ModelBinding.ModelErrorCollection} object that contains any errors that occurred during model binding.

ValueProviderResult.description: Represents the result of binding a value (such as from a form post or query string) to an action-method argument property, or to the argument itself.

attemptedValue.description: Gets or sets the raw value that is converted to a string for display.

rawValue.description: Gets or set the raw value that is supplied by the value provider.

ModelError.description: Represents an error that occurs during model binding.

exception.description: Gets or sets the exception object.

errorMessage.description: Gets or sets the error message.

InternalServerErrorResult.description: Represents an action result that returns an empty {System.Net.HttpStatusCode.InternalServerError} response.

request.description: Gets the request message which led to this result.

cardProxy.description: Card proxy that can be used to process payment.

pricing.description: Applicable pricing based on provided card and payment details.

Pricing.description: Applicable fee for the card used.

processingAmount.description: Total amount that we be charged to the card.

paymentAmount.description: Payment amount i.e. base amount excluding any fee.
Amount is optional. If provided, the applicable pricing will be returned in the result.

threeDSecureData.description: Conditional. Pass the values if 3DSecure is required

useThreeDSecure.description: Will trigger 3DSecure process if enabled or valid for the card

browserData.description: Cardholder's browser data. Mandatory if UseThreeDSecure is true

callbackUrl.description:
Endpoint to receive status notifications once 3DSecure is completed. Use [uniqueId] (case sensitive) in URL to differentiate different payments and 3DS statuses
For example: CallbackUrl https://www.yourdomain.com.au/3dsecure/[uniqueId] will be translated to https://www.yourdomain.com.au/callbacks/123456 assuming uniqueId is 123456

redirectUrl.description:
Redirect URL used to redirect once the 3DSecure process is completed. Use [uniqueId], [status] (case sensitive) in URL to differentiate different payments and 3DS statuses
For example: RedirectUrl https://www.yourdomain.com.au/3dsecure/[uniqueId]?status=[status] will be translated to https://www.yourdomain.com.au/3dsecure/123456?status=Success assuming uniqueId is 123456
Possible 3DSecure statuses: Success, Failed, Cancelled

acceptHeader.description: Exact content of the HTTP accept headers as sent to the 3DS Requestor from the Cardholder's browser

ipAddress.description: IP address of the browser as returned by the HTTP headers to the 3DS Requestor.

language.description: Value representing the browser language as defined in IETF BCP47. The value is limited to 1-8 characters. Value is returned from navigator.language property.

colorDepth.description:
Value representing the bit depth of the colour palette for displaying images, in bits per pixel. Obtained from Cardholder browser using the screen.colorDepth property.
Possible values: 1, 4, 8, 15, 16, 24, 32, 48

screenHeight.description: Total height of the Cardholder's screen in pixels. Value is returned from the screen.height property.

screenWidth.description: Total width of the Cardholder's screen in pixels. Value is returned from the screen.width property.

timezone.description: Time difference between UTC time and the Cardholder browser local time, in minutes. The field is limited to 1-5 characters where the value is returned from the getTimezoneOffset() method.

userAgent.description: Exact content of the HTTP user-agent header. The field is limited to maximum 2048 characters. Obtained from Cardholder browser using the navigator.userAgent property.

cardProxy.description: Processor token. Used to make payment next time.

failureCode.description: Failure code in case the authorisation fails.

failureReason.description: Failure reason in case the authorisation fails.

pricing.description: Applicable pricing based on provided card and payment details.

redirectUrl.description: 3DSecure redirect url to complete the 3DSecure challege if required by the scheme

status.description:
Proxy status
Expected Statuses
1. Pending	This proxy is waiting be to processed
2. Successful - This proxy was successful
3. Failed - This proxy has Failed
4. PendingThreeDS - This proxy needs to complete 3DSecure process using the RedirectUrl

paymentOption.description: Payment option. Use the correct payment option which is supported by the merchant.
paymentOption.PaymentOption: AutoPay: 22; EmailReminder: 23; SmsReminder: 24; FixedTerm: 25; BatchPay: 26; ScheduledPay: 27; OneOff: 28; PayID: 148; BPAY: 149

paymentAmount.description: Payment amount. Set the default amount for auto payments or amount for one-off payment.

paymentFrequency.description: Payment frequency. Applicable to auto pay, email reminder and sms reminder. Returns monthly if frequency is not available.
paymentFrequency.PaymentFrequency: Weekly: 32; Fortnightly: 33; Monthly: 34; Quarterly: 35; HalfYearly: 36; Yearly: 37; FourWeeks: 38

notificationMethod.description: Notification method used to indicate the communication channel when payment successful or failed.

isPayTo.description: Bank account is PayTo if true

payToStatus.description: If PayTo account, this field will let you know the status of the Mandate.

reason.description: Reason if the customer is closed.

closeCustomer.description: True to close, false to open.

CustomerAccountRequest.description:
Customer Bank/Credit Card account. Use PaymentAccountProxy or CreditCardProxy or BankAccount. 
If more than one details are passed, only one detail used as per the following order, 1. PaymentAccountProxy 2. BankAccount 3. CreditCardProxy 
Preferred option is PaymentAccountProxy

bankAccount.description:
Customer bank account details.
Provide valid BSB and Account Number.

creditCardProxy.description:
Customer credit / debit card proxy. 
Proxy is generated using the /cardProxies API or Payments Plugin.

paymentAccountProxy.description:
This replaces the BankAccount and CreditCardProxy. 
Proxy is generated using the Payments Plugin for bank account and card or /cardProxies API for card.

addtionalPaymentAccountProxies.description:
Additional PaymentAccountProxies. 
Proxy is generated using the Payments Plugin for bank account and card or /cardProxies API for card.

cardProxy.description: Card proxy generated by the /cardproxies api.

AccountProxy.description: Account proxy. Recommended to use instead of CardProxy.

proxy.description: Card or bank accont proxy. Proxy is generated using the Payments Plugin for bank account and card or /cardProxies api for card.

title.description: Provide the salutation. Eg: Mr or Mrs

customerReference.description:
Customer / Parent Reference. Should be unique and provided by the merchant.
If you are paying the merchant by BPAY, this should be your BPAY Reference.

title.description: Provide the salutation. Eg: Mr or Mrs

customerCompanyName.description: Company name if this is company account.

merchantStaffMember.description: Merchant Staff member assigned to this customer / parent.

dateOfBirth.description: Date of birth. Customer must be atleast 16 years old.

PaymentResponse.description:
Payment response.
(Conditional) - Fields marked as conditional only returned on certain conditions.

paymentReference.description: Unique Payment Reference for the payment done.

customerReference.description: Reference of the Customer who paid the payment

paymentStatus.description:
Current Status of the payment.
Expected Statuses
1. Pending	This Payment is waiting be to processed
2. Error - This Payment has encountered an Error
3. Submitted - This Payment was successfully submitted
4. Successful - This Payment was successful
5. Successful(Recalled) - This Payment was Recalled
6. Successful(Refunded) - This Payment was Refunded
7. Successful (Refunded) (Recalled) - This Payment was Refunded and Recalled
8. Failed - This Payment has Failed
9. Cancelled - This Payment was Cancelled
10. Suppressed - This Payment was Suppressed
11. InProgress - This Payment is being processed

baseAmount.description: Base amount of the payment is done

paymentAmount.description: Total payment amount including the fees

paymentAccount.description: Payment Account by which the payment is done.

processingDate.description: Processing Date for the payment. Date Format: yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss, TimeZone: AEST

settlementDate.description: Settlement Date for the payment. This is a calculated date and may change until the payment been settled. Date Format: yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss, TimeZone: AEST

processorReference.description: Processor reference for the payment done

isPaymentSettledToMerchant.description: return true if payment is settled to merchant

failureCode.description: return failure code if a payment is failed. Please refer: http://tinyurl.com/y6lkmpsv for more details. (Conditional)

failureReason.description: return failure reason if a payment is failed. (Conditional)

merchantUniquePaymentId.description: Unique payment id provided by the merchant. (Conditional)

isPaymentRetryScheduled.description: Return TRUE if it is a retry payment pending. Based on Program/Merchant settings, a failed payment will be retried.

retryScheduledOn.description: Retry payment scheduled date. Date Format: yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss, TimeZone: AEST (Conditional)

recalledOn.description: Recalled date. Date Format: yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss, TimeZone: AEST (Conditional)

recalledTransactionReference.description: RecalledTransactionReference : If a charge transaction is recalled then this is transaction reference of recall transaction.(Conditional)

refundedOn.description: Refunded date. Date Format: yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss, TimeZone: AEST (Conditional)

refundedTransactionReference.description: RefundedTransactionReference : If a charge transaction is refunded then this is transaction reference of refunded transaction.(Conditional)

transactionType.TransactionType: Charge: 1; InvoicePayment: 2; Refund: 3; Chargeback: 4; Recall: 5; FixedTermSettlement: 6

transactionTypeDisplay.description:
Transaction Type. Possible values:
1. Charge
2. Invoice
3. Refund
4. Chargeback
5. Recall
6. Fixed Term Settlement

originalTransactionReference.description: OriginalTransactionReference : For a Recall / Refund transaction, it is the transaction reference of original transaction.

chargeBackedOn.description: Recalled date. Date Format: yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss, TimeZone: AEST (Conditional)

chargeBackedTransactionReference.description: ChargedBackedTransactionReference : If a charge transaction is charged back then this is transaction reference of charged back transaction.(Conditional)

settlementPostPartialRefund.description: Balance Payment if any is available

refunds.description: All refunds processed on this payment

recalls.description: All recalls processed on this payment

redirectUrl.description: 3DSecure redirect url to complete the 3DSecure challege if required by the scheme

customerCode.description: returns CustomerCode. This is unique reference for a customer if they are in the systerm

processedOn.description: Processing date. Date Format: yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss, TimeZone: AEST

status.description:
Current Status of the balance payment.
Expected Statuses
1. Pending
2. Error
3. Submitted
4. Successful
5. Failed
6. Cancelled
7. Suppressed
8. InProgress

merchantSettlementDate.description: Date payment will be settled to the merchant

fundsToMerchant.description: Amount to be settled to the merchant

processedOn.description: Refund/Recall date. Date Format: yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss, TimeZone: AEST (Conditional)

paymentAmount.description: Total payment amount including the fees

transactionReference.description: TransactionReference : If a charge transaction is refunded/recalled then this is transaction reference of that transaction.(Conditional)

status.description:
Current Status of the refund/recall.
Expected Statuses
1. Pending	This refund/recall is waiting be to processed
2. Error - This refund/recall has encountered an Error
3. Submitted - This refund/recall was successfully submitted
4. Successful - This refund/recall was successful
5. Failed - This refund/recall has Failed
6. Cancelled - This refund/recall was Cancelled
7. Suppressed - This refund/recall was Suppressed
8. InProgress - This refund/recall is being processed

cancelReason.description: Reason for the refund request cancellation. This field will returned only if the status is 'Canceled'

rejectReason.description: Reason for the refund request rejected. This field will returned only if the status is 'Rejected'

refundValue.description: Refund value - Defaults to 'BaseAmount' (1) if not passed.

refundAmount.description: Refund Amount (Conditional). Amount is required when Refund Value is 'Partial' (2)

customerReference.description: Customer reference. Required only when payment account proxy or card proxy is not provided.

cardProxy.description: Card Proxy (Conditional). Use only if you want to pay using card proxy.

paymentAccountProxy.description: Card or bank accont proxy. Proxy is generated using the Payments Plugin for bank account and card or /cardProxies API for card.

additionalReference.description: Additional reference. This field is returned in reconciliation reports.

merchantUniquePaymentId.description: Unique payment id provided by the merchant.

sendPaymentConfirmation.description: Flag to send the customer invoice.

customerEmail.description: The customer email to which an invoice is sent to.

oneOffPaymentReference.description: One Off Payment reference. This field is returned in reconciliation reports.

overrideFeePayer.description:
Override Fee Payer. This field is to determine who is paying transaction fee. 
0 Use Set Profile - default
1 Merchant Pays Fee (if allowed)
2 Customer Pays Fee (if allowed)

failureCode.description: return failure code if a payment is failed. Please refer: http://tinyurl.com/y6lkmpsv for more details. (Conditional)

failureReason.description: return failure reason if a payment is failed. (Conditional)

merchantUniquePaymentId.description: Unique payment id provided by the merchant. (Conditional)

isPaymentRetryScheduled.description: Return TRUE if it is a retry payment pending. Based on Program/Merchant settings, a failed payment will be retried.

retryScheduledOn.description: Retry payment scheduled date. Date Format: yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss, TimeZone: AEST (Conditional)

recalledOn.description: Recalled date. Date Format: yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss, TimeZone: AEST (Conditional)

recalledTransactionReference.description: RecalledTransactionReference : If a charge transaction is recalled then this is transaction reference of recall transaction.(Conditional)

refundedOn.description: Refunded date. Date Format: yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss, TimeZone: AEST (Conditional)

refundedTransactionReference.description: RefundedTransactionReference : If a charge transaction is refunded then this is transaction reference of refunded transaction.(Conditional)

transactionType.TransactionType: Charge: 1; InvoicePayment: 2; Refund: 3; Chargeback: 4; Recall: 5; FixedTermSettlement: 6

transactionTypeDisplay.description:
Transaction Type. Possible values:
1. Charge
2. Invoice
3. Refund
4. Chargeback
5. Recall
6. Fixed Term Settlement

originalTransactionReference.description: OriginalTransactionReference : For a Recall / Refund transaction, it is the transaction reference of original transaction.

chargeBackedOn.description: Recalled date. Date Format: yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss, TimeZone: AEST (Conditional)

chargeBackedTransactionReference.description: ChargedBackedTransactionReference : If a charge transaction is charged back then this is transaction reference of charged back transaction.(Conditional)

PaymentAccountProxyResponse.description: Payment Account Proxy Response Model - represents the different response structures

statusDescription.example: Account is active and ready for payments

RequestPayRequest.description:
Container for request to pay entries
Root element containing a collection of RequestPayEntry

merchantUniqueRequestBatchId.description: Unique batch id provided by the merchant.

RequestPayRequestRecord.description: Represent one request pay entry sent from the client

customerReference.description: customer reference in individual payment request entry

paymentAmount.description: Payment amount in individual payment request entry

email.description: Customer email in individual payment request entry. Use comma or semicolon to provide more than one email address for a customer.

mobile.description: Customer mobile in individual payment request entry

merchantUniquePaymentId.description: Unique payment id provided by the merchant. Can be used when Proxy payment is performed. (Optional)

requestPayId.description: Id of RequestPay for call to Uploading

merchantUniqueRequestBatchId.description: Unique request pay batch id provided by the merchant.

version.description: Required. Plugin version. Always use the latest

endpointUrl.description: Endpoint url of the plugin. Just provide the base url. For example: https://pay.travelpay.com.au

merchantCode.description: Merchant code. Make sure the merchant code is related to the API credentials

isJsPlugin.description: Is JS Plugin. Default is true. Set to false if you want to use without iframe.

mode.description:
Optional.
Must be one of the following three values
0 - Make Payment
1 - Tokenise
2 - Custom Payment
3 - Preauthorization

Defaults to 0 if not provided.

userMode.description:
Optional.
Must be one of the following two values
0 - Customer Facing - default (cardholder must enter CCV or 3DS)
1 - Merchant Facing(for merchant use only - no CCV or 3DS) - if supported by merchant options.

displayMode.description:
Optional.
Must be one of the following two values
0 - Default(Modal)
1 - Redirect Url

Defaults to 0 if not provided.
*Google Pay and Apple Pay works if Modal or Redirect Url with iframe is used.

redirectUrl.description:
Required.
The page will redirect to this URL with the result in the query string. Refer the return parameters section below.

customerName.description:
Conditional.
Required if mode is set to 0 or 2.

customerReference.description:
Conditional.
Required if mode is set to 0 or 2.

paymentAmount.description:
Conditional.
Required if mode is set to 0 or 2.
Returns applicable fee if provided with mode 1.

showFeeOnTokenising.description:
Required if mode is set to 1.
Show the applicable fees for the token at the end of the process.Default is false.

showFailedPaymentFeeOnTokenising.description:
Optional if mode is set to 1.
Show the applicable failed payment fees for the token at the end of the process.Default is false.

merchantUniquePaymentId.description:
Required.
Payment id provided by the merchant. Must be unique and can not be reused if a transaction is processed using this id. This field also work as IdempotencyKey for request for successful requests.

timestamp.description:
Required.
Timestamp is required from v4. Provide current datetime in UTC ISO 8601 format as timestamp. format: yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss

paymentAccountProxy.description:
Conditional.
Use this parameter to make a payment using a payment account proxy which is generated using mode '1'.

callbackUrl.description:
Optional.
The URL will be called with HTTP POST method to submit the result. Refer to Payment Plugin documentation for payment response payload.

hideTermsAndConditions.description:
Optional.
This will hide the Terms and Conditions.
Defaults to 'false' if not provided.

sendConfirmationEmailToMerchant.description:
Optional.
This will send confirmation email to merchant.
Defaults to 'false' if not provided.

customerEmail.description:
Required.
Email address to which invoice will be emailed if the merchant is configured.
It is mandatory from V4.

businessNumber.description:
Optional.
Business Number (For example: ABN). Used for reward programs if the Program is enabled to provide reward points.

overrideFeePayer.description:
Optional.
Must be one of the following three values
0 - Default(based on pricing profile)
1 - Merchant(Merchant will pay the fee regardless of pricing profile setting)
2 - Customer(Customer will pay the fee regardless of pricing profile setting)
Defaults to 0 if not provided.

departureDate.description:
Conditional.
DepartureDate is required for Slice Pay. Provide date in UTC ISO 8601 format as departureDate. format: yyyy-MM-dd

sendConfirmationEmailToCustomer.description:
Optional.
This will send confirmation email to customer.
Defaults to 'false' if not provided.

allowSaveCardUserOption.description:
Optional.
This will allow to save the card information.
Defaults to 'false' if not provided.
This option will only work if 'Enable Plugin Pay & Save Card' option is enabled at program or merchant level.

sku1.description:
Optional.
Stock Keeping Unit  Optional text fields, allowing up to 50 alphanumeric characters. If the value exceeds 50 characters, only the first 50 characters will be retained and the rest discarded.

sku2.description:
Optional
Stock Keeping Unit  Optional text fields, allowing up to 50 alphanumeric characters. If the value exceeds 50 characters, only the first 50 characters will be retained and the rest discarded.

customization.description:
Optional.
Fields to customize the plugin fields

fingerprint.description: Not required. This is a internal field and no need to populate.

apiKey.description: Not required. This is a internal field and no need to populate.

bankAccount.description:
Conditional.
Required if mode is set to 0 or 2.
Show bank account option only if the option is enable for the merchant.Default is false.

payTo.description:
Conditional.
Required if mode is set to 0 or 2.
Show PayTo option only if the option is enable for the merchant.Default is false.

payId.description:
Conditional.
Required if mode is set to 0 or 2.
Show PayID option only if the option is enable for the merchant.Default is false.

applePay.description:
Conditional if mode is set to 0.
Show Apple Pay option only if the option is enable for the merchant.Default is false.

googlePay.description:
Conditional if mode is set to 0.
Show Google Pay option only if the option is enable for the merchant.Default is false.

latitudePay.description:
Conditional if mode is set to 0.
Show Latitude Pay option only if the option is enable for the merchant.Default is false.

slicePay.description:
Conditional if mode is set to 0.
Show Slice Pay option only if the option is enable for the merchant.Default is false.

unionPay.description:
Conditional if mode is set to 0.
Show UnionPay option only if the option is enable for the merchant.Default is false.

title.description:
Plugin Title.
Defaults to 'Process Payment' if not provided.

hideMerchantLogo.description:
This will hide the merchant logo if any.
Defaults to 'false' if not provided.

customerNameLabel.description: Custom label to override default customer name display text

customerReferenceLabel.description: Custom label to override default customer reference display text

paymentAmountLabel.description: Custom label to override default payment amount display text

secureToken.description: Token used to initialize the payment plugin.

tags.name: BatchPayments
tags.description: Manage Batch Payments. You can create or fetch batch payments.

tags.name: Payments
tags.description: Manage Payments. You can create or fetch one-off payments.

tags.name: Preauths
tags.description: Preauth -- Create, Fetch, Void and Capture

tags.name: RequestPays
tags.description: Manage request to pays.You can create or fetch request pays.
